sentence.Network_en: Almost from the outset, the extravaganza was beset with difficulties.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎从一开始, 这一盛事就被种种困难所困扰.

sentence.Network_en: He was not here at the outset of the experiment.
sentence.Network_cn: 实验开始时他不在这里.

sentence.Network_en: The novel fascinates the reader from the outset.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部小说一开头就把读者迷住了.

航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(O) ... outsail 航行得比…更快 outset 开头 outside admission 外进汽.
guttle的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... multitude 多数, 群众... outset 着手, 开头, 最初.

That is to say , we at the outset plan picture is complete bubble soup ., 也就是说 , 我们当初的计画完全泡汤了.

entry.tran: 在开始时/ 从一开始
entry.def: If something happens at the outset of an event, process, or period of time, it happens at the beginning of it. If something happens from the outset it happens from the beginning and continues to happen.

example.ex: Decide at the outset what kind of learning programme you want to follow...
example.tran: 开始时就选定自己的学习方案。

example.ex: From the outset he had put his trust in me, the son of his old friend.
example.tran: 他从一开始就很信任我这个他老朋友的儿子。

means.word_mean: 1. the time at which something is supposed to begin;

sentences.sentence: "she knew from the get-go that he was the man for her"

auth_sentence.content: From the outset Freud had been suspicious of him.
auth_sentence.res_content: From the outset Freud had been suspicious of him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: From the outset Freud had been suspicious of him.

auth_sentence.content: Nonetheless, its magnificence was clear from the outset.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nonetheless, its magnificence was clear from the outset.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nonetheless, its magnificence was clear from the outset.

auth_sentence.content: From the outset the Ben Bella regime was populist.
auth_sentence.res_content: From the outset the Ben Bella regime was populist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: From the outset the Ben Bella regime was populist.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出去.过时,外面"; 2. 表示"超过.过度"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 室外的, 户外的, 野外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+door门→adj.室外的, 户外的, 野外的
out出去.过时,外面+er→adj.外部的,外面的,外层的
out出去.过时,外面+going走→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
out出去.过时,外面+land地+ish……的→外地来的→奇异的
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out超过.过度+size范围→范围超出
out超过.过度+standing标准的→adj.突出的, 显著的
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+side旁边→在外边
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out出去.过时,外面+break中断→事情断裂→爆发
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外出, 旅行, 散步
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+ing状态→n.外出, 旅行, 散步
out出去.过时,外面+let表名词→n.出口, 出路
out出去.过时,外面+line线条→划出线条→大纲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 景色, 风光, 观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+look看→n.景色, 风光, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 产量, 输出, 输出量
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+put放,摆→放出,输出→产量
out出去.过时,外面+rage怒气→怒气外露→粗暴
out出去.过时,外面+set安置好→在外面放置好→开端
out出去.过时,外面+skirt裙子;引申为城市周边+s→郊区
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+law法律→超越法律之人
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+bid出价→出价超出
out超过.过度+do做→做得超出别人
out超过.过度+live活→超过别人活着
out超过.过度+number数量→v.在数量上超过
out超过.过度+wear穿→穿出了[洞]
out超过.过度+wit智慧→机智超出别人

sentences.en: I warned you at the outset not to trust him, and you wouldn't listen to me.
sentences.cn: 一开始我就警告过你不要信任他, 可你不肯听我的话。

sentences.en: He was not here at the outset of the experiment.
sentences.cn: 实验开始时他不在这里。
